website_summaries.verdict: The Skechers D’Lites – Life Saver is the American lifestyle brand’s take on a classic looking women’s walking and training shoe with reliable cushioning and superior traction. The shoes are kept ventilated by the cooling memory foam and well-placed mesh upper material that keeps the feet breathing all throughout the workout.This fitness and walking shoe is the perfect companion for long walks or light sports activities or simply just chilling out with friends.
pros: Many users commented that the soft fabric lining made the shoes very comfortable
A lot of reviewers are impressed with the lightweight mesh materials used in the upper
Majority of those who commented agreed that the Skechers D'Lites - Life Saver is an extremely comfortable walking shoe
Some buyers appreciate the rubber toe and heel bumpers as it protects their feet from bumps and injuries during heavy workouts or sudden bumps
A good number of female users are pleased with the 25-inch heel as it is very stable and gives ample protection and height boost from puddles and mud
Several women complimented the air-cooled memory foam and the mesh fabric material as it keeps their feet cool during heavy sports and activities
Numerous customers appreciate the design and the shiny metallic overlays and fashionable accents
Users are pleased to wear the shoes during workout exercises and gym routines as they are very protective of the foot from injuries
Most commented that dirt easily washes off the nubuck leather material giving them ease in cleaning the sneakers
Customers with flat feet appreciate the moderate arch support that makes every stride comfortable
Many consumers expressed satisfaction on the lightweight shock absorbing midsole that keep every step comfortable
Various women wearers claimed they felt having a little extra room for the foot to move inside the D’Lites
cons: Some are not pleased with the clunky design of the Skechers D'Lites - Life Saver
A few commented that the shoe takes time to break-in as cushioning seems a bit hard at first use
Another critic observed that the insole tend to be harder compared to other training shoes
A couple of commenters also complained that some parts of the shoe breaks off easily and show early signs of wearing out after a few uses

customer_reviews.title: So light it's like wearing your slippers
customer_reviews.text: Love them , always buy skechers as they are so comfortable, they are light on your feet . Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: sally scott

customer_reviews.title: I really like these trainers and ordered my usual size in Skechers ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like these trainers and ordered my usual size in Skechers which is a 4. Unfortunately in this style they were a bit too short and a 4 and a half was not available so I had to return them. I was sorry to do so as this is a really nice trainer in a very nice dusty blue colour. I love Skechers for comfort and style and would certainly try a different style in the future from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: loopty

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money & with a nice touch in changable laces
customer_reviews.text: good comfortable exactly what I asked for, I am really pleased with the trainers, comes with blue laces as well so you can change them (white did look very different, a bit overpowering for me) I liked this little touch
customer_reviews.author: Liz Price

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable, look great and feel great. very pleased with this purchase. would definitely recommend these skechers. thank you
customer_reviews.author: William Hannan

customer_reviews.title: Little of the large size!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking trainers and very comfy but found them just a bit too big. Heal sometimes moved up and down when walking. I have always been a size 5 (38) shoe but these seem to be varying a lot recently.
customer_reviews.author: A. M. Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. After reading other reviews I ordered a half size smaller than I normally wear and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous, so comfy, helped so much with my Planta Fasciitis in only 3 days, a lot less pain. I tend to walk 5-10 miles and no problem at all. Most comfortable trainers I've ever bought. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Louise

customer_reviews.title: Excellent trainers and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: A very comfortable trainer and fits perfectly. Very happy with my purchase and I've recommended it to my friends. You can't put a price on comfort and these are great value for money. Postage was swift,no hassle. Many thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look like trendy not too fuddy fuddy boot like
customer_reviews.text: Comfy and waterproof. Look like trendy not too fuddy fuddy boot like. Usual Skechers standard big hit

customer_reviews.title: Good for walking, not for running
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable for walking in and good for spinning class which is what I bought them for. Not really any good for running though as they are too chunky and have no real bounce to them so no good for gym work and HIIT class. They are exactly what I wanted for spinning so am very happy.

customer_reviews.title: ... so well made bright colour without being flashy so happy I got a pair
customer_reviews.text: After everyone raves about Sketchers I thought might has well try a pair for my dance glasses well everyone told the truth they are the most comfy trainer I have ever worn so well made bright colour without being flashy so happy I got a pair

I wore them from new for 2 weeks solid around Canada - no aching feet at all. Can't wait to work them out at the gym now. They still look brand new so very hard wearing too.

customer_reviews.title: Great comfortable and good quality shoes at a very affordable price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes at a discount and the shoes were very comfortable to walk in for nearly an hour on the first day of wearing them. The cushion foam inside the shoes is a bonus. Very happy with the condition, only slight downside is in wet weather on smooth slippery gravel surfaces, i found i had to slow down as the shoes still slide so i didn't fall down.
customer_reviews.author: Penny T.

product_meta.title: Skechers Women's D'Lites - Life Saver Low-Top Sneakers
product_meta.description: Add that classic comfort flavour to your look with the Skechers D'LITES - LIFE SAVER shoe. Smooth nubuck leather and mesh fabric upper in a lace up sporty casual sneaker with stitching and overlay accents. Air cooled memory foam insole.
